about_the_game:
This is the third racing simulation game I have made, which is mainly developed around drag racing crime (police and bandits chase).

Game play:

Complete the delivery task during the day to earn game money, and use these to buy vehicles/garages, with almost no threat during the day.

However, in the "night" mode, you can earn money and vehicle parts for vehicle upgrades through various competitions in the map. Note that there will be patrol police cars in the "night" mode. As long as they find out, blind confrontation without skills will make your game very unfriendly.

In the past, I made the whole city chase 1 and the whole city chase 2, which are multiplayer online games. (The whole city chase 1 and the whole city chase 2 are all developed mobile phone versions, so I can't continue to play at present. Chasing the whole city 3, it is my first time to make a PC and log on to Steam)

Because the game is developed by myself, there are many bad places you can post suggestions to me, and I will read every suggestion carefully, thank you!

In the future, the gameplay and game quality will be updated for free: Maybe I will update more new levels after the game is released, which may also include the improvement and reproduction of the game content. Players who have already bought the game don't have to pay for these updates again. However, the price of the game may increase with the update. (The game has no express or implied warranty)

name: The Wanted 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400, 3.2 GHz 1 Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB或GeForce GTX 660, 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: In the case of the lowest image quality, it can run at Low resolution at 60fps. & If the current equipment load is too large, the number of frames will fluctuate.&It is not recommended to run on Mechanical Hard Disk.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700K CPU @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060,4G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: In the case of the highest picture quality, it can run at 120fps at 2 K. & If the current equipment load is too large, the number of frames will fluctuate.&It is not recommended to run on Mechanical Hard Disk.

short_description: Earn game money during the day, crash a police car at night, and become the most wanted man. Whether you can successfully finish the race and escape the police car, everything depends on "The Wanted 3"!
